FAQ.desc: We attempt to make the procedures as simple as possible. Besides, we shall assist you with rational investment options.

FaqDATA.ques: What are the modules covered under Skillslash’s Block Chain course?
FaqDATA.ans: In this extensive block chain programming course, you will learn about block chain and its importance, block chain transaction process, bitcoin blockchain, hyper ledger etc. Besides, you will get block chain programming training covering the fundamentals of JavaScript, HTML, CSS and Linux.

FaqDATA.ques: What are the key skills that this Block Chain course focus on?
FaqDATA.ans: The riot block chain certificate program gives emphasis to boosting the skillset in Bitcoin and block chain technology in particular. In addition, you will get an opportunity to skill up in multichain block chain platforms, Ethereum and Hyperledger. Furthermore, you will be trained on how to use tools like Meta Mask and Truffle under this Block Chain course.

FaqDATA.ques: What is the Block Chain course fees and duration at Skillslash?
FaqDATA.ans: Skillslash’s Block Chain course duration is 6 months and block chain programming course fees starts from INR 59,000. Besides, you can additionally avail a scholarship under our block chain certification program. That said, a 10% scholarship has relevancy just in case you are displaying excellence within the aptitude exam. So, if a candidate scores about sixty-five percentage in the exam, she or he gets an eligibility for a 10-percentage discount on the Block Chain course fees.

FaqDATA.ques: If I am forced to omit a class due to an emergency, will there be a makeup class available?
FaqDATA.ans: Firstly, we offer direct on-line classes. Besides, all of our students get video recordings of these classes. Furthermore, we offer you with unrestricted access to the recorded sessions so you can use them whenever you would like theoretical help. So, just in case you omit any of the classes, you need not be disappointed. That said, we do, however, strongly inspire you to attend the classes regularly.

FaqDATA.ques: How many projects are included in this Block Chain course?
FaqDATA.ans: Skillslash’s block chain certification course is extensive and designed giving emphasis to industry training. Which means, you get to participate in about 15+ live block chain projects and learn exactly what is block chain technology. Besides, we offer you live projects that covers Hyperledger, Ethereum, Multichain, and Bitcoin. Also, you can avail direct project certifications from top startups for these projects under our Block Chain course.

FaqDATA.ques: What kind of certification does Block Chain Course course provide?
FaqDATA.ans: Most importantly, you absolutely won’t receive any ordinary sort of certification or diploma under our block chain programming course. Instead, we offer valuable project experience certificates this is often identified anywhere withinside the planet. Besides, direct certifications also are available from the corporate with which you completed your industrial projects.
